channel.title: When you add an item, etc
channel.description: when you add an item etc... do i use spawn = 5[]6[]7[]8 or do i use 5 6 7 8, if both of those are wrong, what do i do to fix it?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 11:00:49 AM[/size][hr]someone please help[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 11:11:27 AM[/size][hr]or do i push something like "ctrl" and "k"

item.description:
@zauruke wrote:

no, omg, that is for when your on your server, i mean add it to your server so it’s always there and respawns there all by it’s self… and i was wondering when your in npcspawn.crl or whatever… what do i put between the numbers so i can add them… duhh.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 11:23:31 AM[/size][hr]someone help[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 11:29:21 AM[/size][hr]omfg i still didn’t get help with what i needed it for, they posting retarded in game spawning. geez

item.title: When you add an item, etc
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

oh npcs, do this…
::npc (i.d. of npc)
its kinda like summoning but if you want them to permantely be there you want to do this…
open up you npc.notepad, then just follow up from there, its pretty easy once you read it.

item.title: When you add an item, etc
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

it depends on what server your using, some servers dont let you spawn, but on mopar “create your own server” it is like this…

::pickup (i.d of item) (How many you want)
Then it will add it to your inventory.

Hope it helps, Dell

Read full topic
